page.title: 13THORNHILL EMPLOYMENT
page.content: We live in an agricultrural community.A lot of people either own farms or work on them.Dykes is a privately owned agricultural workshop and is situated on the Aberfoyle road.There are a lot of haulage businesses,one of which is Thomson's which is based opposite the school.Mr.Thomson carries hay,grain and animal feed around Britain.Bisset,a bigger firm,carries nearly anything but livestock and he travels around Europe. Paul's father has two lorries and travels within Scotland.Mr.Cartney goes often to Skye,the Western Isles and sometimes to England.Many people commute daily.Some work in Stirling and some even travel as far as Glasgow and Edinburgh.
